featured.text: Then pour the popcorn into a bowl and season with a small 40 of real butter or olive oil and natural salt.
To make fresh lemonade, cut the lemon in half, _____ the juice into a bowl, and then add as much water and sugar as you like. (A) decrease (B) squeeze (C) freeze (D) cease 12.

definition.zh_def: 碗；圓形的容器，通常用於盛裝食物或液體。
definition.en_def: A round, deep dish or basin used for food or liquid.
definition.example: She poured the soup into a large bowl.
